entry.tran: 印地语（印度北部使用的语言，为印度官方语言之一）
entry.def: Hindi is a language that is spoken by people in northern India. It is also one of the official languages of India.

means.word_mean: 1. the most widely spoken of modern Indic vernaculars; spoken mostly in the north of India; along with English it is the official language of India; usually written in Devanagari script
1. of or relating to or supporting Hinduism;
